sentences.english: There was a fish pond near the shady tree.
sentences.chinese: 在綠蔭如蓋的樹旁有一個魚塘。

sentences.english: So it is no longer green.
sentences.chinese: 小橡樹不再是一片綠蔭。

sentences.english: Except the straggling green which hides the wood.
sentences.chinese: 只見那樹林中綠蔭丰姿。

sentences.english: I miss you when I'm irritable, just as I miss the green shade in the blazing sun.
sentences.chinese: 煩躁的時候，我想念你，就如同炎炎烈日下想念綠蔭。

sentences.english: In autumn September, corridor twists and turns, green did not retreat, pity for the people to stop this incessant.
sentences.chinese: 九月秋，長廊曲折，綠蔭未退，憐人止步於此不絕。

sentences.english: To a green thought in a green shade.
sentences.chinese: 在一片綠蔭下懷着天真的想法。

sentences.english: World of clear and clarity, dense shade Sheng, Flower and Montreal.
sentences.chinese: 天地清晰而澄澈，綠蔭盛密，落花滿地。

sentences.english: Did you ever enjoyed the cool air under the shade to experience the summer's tender feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你也曾經在綠蔭下乘涼，體驗夏天的柔情嗎？

sentences.english: I once in under that verdant green shade.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在那滴翠的綠蔭下。

sentences.english: Through primrose tufts, in that green bower.
sentences.chinese: 那邊綠蔭中的櫻草花叢。
人們在我的綠蔭下休息。

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
fence (esp. of bamboo or wood railings)
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
